attributes.action: Resurrect Flybe if government assistance is arranged for UK aviation industry
attributes.additional_details: Regional connectivity is critical to those of us who do not live in the 'opportunity areas', Flybe provided so much of that connectivity.  Projects like HS2 focuses on connecting wealth cities and do nothing to help the regions.  Bring back the vital connectivity needed for those who live in all 4 corners or the UK.
attributes.background: If the UK's Aviation industry's request, lead by Virgin group but supported by other UK airlines, for financial assistance is approved there should be action taken to resurrect Flybe either re-starting the airline or building a new one prioritising ex-Flybe staff for employment.

rejection.details:
The UK Government is not responsible for the operations or activities of individual companies, and is also not responsible for directly running airline operations.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to support the British aviation industry during the COVID-19 outbreak: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions?q=aviation&state=open
